metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29980 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Uninitialized memory in a canvas object could have caused an incorrectfree() leading to memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.13, Thunderbird < 91, FirefoxESR < 78.13, and Firefox < 91.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
